TICKETS

Since 2009 Benoît is an e-commerce consultant and founder of an e-commerce informations blog. He used to be the e-commerce manager of the Palace of Teas website, EnjoySunGlasses and Rexel. Benoît is now cofounder and associate manager at Skeelbox, an independant e-commerce strategy agency.

http://www.info-ecommerce.fr/
